verses.verse: Then <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2658>came<s%> he <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1191>Derbe<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3082>Lystra:<s%> <S%G2532>and,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1563>there,<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy,<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G1135>woman,<s%> which was a <S%G2453>Jewess,<s%> and <S%G4103>believed;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> his <S%G3962>father<s%> was a Greek: <S%G1672><s%>
Which <S%G3739><s%> was well reported <S%G3140>of<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> that were <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3082>Lystra<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2430>Iconium.<s%>

Him <S%G5126><s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> have to go <S%G1831>forth<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>him;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> and <S%G4059>circumcised<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> because <S%G1223>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> which <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G5117>quarters:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G1492>knew<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G5225>was<s%> a <S%G1672>Greek.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> they went <S%G1279>through<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4172>cities,<s%> they <S%G3860>delivered<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1378>decrees<s%> for to <S%G5442>keep,<s%> that were <S%G2919>ordained<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem.<s%>

And <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3303>so<s%> were <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1577>churches<s%> <S%G4732>established<s%> in <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4052>increased<s%> in <S%G706>number<s%> <S%G2596>daily.<s%> <S%G2250><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when they had gone <S%G1330>throughout<s%> <S%G5435>Phrygia<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5561>region<s%> of <S%G1054>Galatia,<s%> and were <S%G2967>forbidden<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> to <S%G2980>preach<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G773>Asia,<s%>

After they were <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G3465>Mysia,<s%> they <S%G3985>attempted<s%> to <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G2596>into<s%> <S%G978>Bithynia:<s%> <S%G2532>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1439>suffered<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3756>not.<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> they passing <S%G3928>by<s%> <S%G3465>Mysia<s%> came <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5174>Troas.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> a <S%G3705>vision<s%> <S%G3700>appeared<s%> to <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1223>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3571>night;<s%> there <S%G2258>stood<s%> <S%G2476><s%> a <S%G435>man<s%> of <S%G3110>Macedonia,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3870>prayed<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Come <S%G1224>over<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia,<s%> and <S%G997>help<s%> <S%G2254>us.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>after<s%> he had <S%G1492>seen<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3705>vision,<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> we <S%G2212>endeavored<s%> to <S%G1831>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia,<s%> assuredly <S%G4822>gathering<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> had <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> for to preach the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> unto <S%G846>them.<s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G321>loosing<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5174>Troas,<s%> we came with a straight <S%G2113>course<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4543>Samothracia,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1966>next<s%> day <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3496>Neapolis;<s%>

And <S%G5037><s%> from <S%G1564>thence<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5375>Philippi,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G4413>chief<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> of that <S%G3310>part<s%> of <S%G3109>Macedonia,<s%> and a <S%G2862>colony:<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> we <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5026>that<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G1304>abiding<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%>

And <S%G5037><s%> <S%G2250>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> we <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1854>out<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G3844>by<s%> a river <S%G4215>side,<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G4335>prayer<s%> was <S%G3543>wont<s%> to be <S%G1511>made;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> we sat <S%G2523>down,<s%> and <S%G2980>spake<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> which <S%G4905>resorted<s%> thither.

And <S%G2532><s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G3070>Lydia,<s%> a seller of <S%G4211>purple,<s%> of the <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G2363>Thyatira,<s%> which <S%G4576>worshipped<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> us: <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G1272>opened,<s%> that she <S%G4337>attended<s%> unto the things which were <S%G2980>spoken<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G3972>Paul.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> she was <S%G907>baptized,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G848>her<s%> <S%G3624>household,<s%> she <S%G3870>besought<s%> us, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> ye have <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1525>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3624>house,<s%> and <S%G3306>abide<s%> there. <S%G2532>And<s%> she <S%G3849>constrained<s%> <S%G2248>us.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass,<s%> as <S%G2257>we<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4335>prayer,<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3814>damsel<s%> <S%G2192>possessed<s%> with a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G4436>divination<s%> <S%G528>met<s%> <S%G2254>us,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G3930>brought<s%> <S%G848>her<s%> <S%G2962>masters<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2039>gain<s%> by soothsaying: <S%G3132><s%>

The <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G2628>followed<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2254>us,<s%> and <S%G2896>cried,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> the <S%G1401>servants<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> most <S%G5310>high<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2605>show<s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G4991>salvation.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G1909>she<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%> <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> being <S%G1278>grieved,<s%> <S%G1994>turned<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> I <S%G3853>command<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> to <S%G1831>come<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G846>her.<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> he came <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G848>her<s%> <S%G2962>masters<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G2039>gains<s%> was <S%G1831>gone,<s%> they <S%G1949>caught<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4609>Silas,<s%> and <S%G1670>drew<s%> them <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G58>marketplace<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G758>rulers,<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4317>brought<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4755>magistrates,<s%> <S%G2036>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G5225>being<s%> <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> do exceedingly <S%G1613>trouble<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2605>teach<s%> <S%G1485>customs,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> are not <S%G1832>lawful<s%> <S%G3756><s%> for <S%G2254>us<s%> to <S%G3858>receive,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> to <S%G4160>observe,<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G4514>Romans.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> rose up <S%G4911>together<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G846>them:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4755>magistrates<s%> rent <S%G4048>off<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2440>clothes,<s%> and <S%G2753>commanded<s%> to <S%G4463>beat<s%> them.

And <S%G5037><s%> when they had <S%G2007>laid<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4127>stripes<s%> upon <S%G846>them,<s%> they <S%G906>cast<s%> them <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5438>prison,<s%> <S%G3853>charging<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1200>jailer<s%> to <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> safely: <S%G806><s%>

Who, <S%G3739><s%> having <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> a <S%G3852>charge,<s%> <S%G906>thrust<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2082>inner<s%> <S%G5438>prison,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> made their feet <S%G805>fast<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G4228><s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3586>stocks.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2596>at<s%> <S%G3317>midnight<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4609>Silas<s%> <S%G4336>prayed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> sang <S%G5214>praises<s%> unto <S%G2316>God:<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1198>prisoners<s%> <S%G1874>heard<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G869>suddenly<s%> there <S%G1096>was<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>earthquake,<s%> so <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2310>foundations<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1201>prison<s%> were <S%G4531>shaken:<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G3916>immediately<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2374>doors<s%> were <S%G455>opened,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> every <S%G3956>one's<s%> <S%G1199>bands<s%> were <S%G447>loosed.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> keeper of the <S%G1200>prison<s%> awaking out of his <S%G1096>sleep,<s%> <S%G1853><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>seeing<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5438>prison<s%> <S%G2374>doors<s%> <S%G455>open,<s%> he drew <S%G4685>out<s%> his <S%G3162>sword,<s%> and <S%G3195>would<s%> have <S%G337>killed<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G3543>supposing<s%> that <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1198>prisoners<s%> had been <S%G1628>fled.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G5455>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4238>Do<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G2556>harm:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G1759>here.<s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G154>called<s%> for a <S%G5457>light,<s%> and sprang <S%G1530>in,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> <S%G1790>trembling,<s%> and fell down <S%G4363>before<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4609>Silas,<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4254>brought<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1854>out,<s%> and <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G2962>Sirs,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> be <S%G4982>saved?<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G4100>Believe<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> shalt be <S%G4982>saved,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3624>house.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G2980>spake<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> were <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3614>house.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3880>took<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1565>same<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3571>night,<s%> and <S%G3068>washed<s%> <S%G575>their<s%> <S%G4127>stripes;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> was <S%G907>baptized,<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G846>his,<s%> <S%G3916>straightway.<s%>

And <S%G5037><s%> when he had <S%G321>brought<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3624>house,<s%> he set meat <S%G3908>before<s%> <S%G5132><s%> them, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G21>rejoiced,<s%> <S%G4100>believing<s%> in <S%G2316>God<s%> with all his <S%G3832>house.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> when it <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4755>magistrates<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4465>sergeants,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Let those men <S%G630>go.<s%> <S%G1565><s%> <S%G444><s%>
